overview: Deeper explores the more graphic urges below the surface in Lewd, a hand-selected collection of stories featuring women with particular appeties and the men who feed them. Drenched in spit, sweat, squirt and more, each scene showcases its talent in all of their raw sexual glory. Khloe squirts until the room is wet. Gia tempts her partner into retalistory anal. kenzie puches her partner to push her back, and Brooklyn documents a long list of men with whom she's engaged in a illicit habit. Each is lewdly authentic and impossible to forget.
tagline: Each is lewdly authentic and impossible to forget.
title: Lewd
